Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: New state declares independence in the territory of the Rasalhague Military District Yesterday a new state saw the light when Elected Prince Haakon Magnusson read "Declaration of Freedom" from the rotunda at the base of the Freedom Building on [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Rasalhague],Rasalhague]], declaring the creation of the "Free Rasalhague Republic". The declaration of independence, surprising the major nations of Inner Sphere, was met enthusiastically by the population of the new state and a surprisingly measured response by Coordinator Kurita.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
The newly founded [[DM.Factions[faction_Rasalhague],Free Rasalhague Republic]] is laying claim to all systems within DCMS's former Rasalhague Military District, which besides systems controlled by Draconis Combine also covers systems recently conquered by Lyran Commonwealth.

ComStarâ€™s First Circuit was the first to acknowledge the new republic and is pledging to maintain HPG service in the territories claimed by the new state, graciously offering a small discount for the new nation for a period of two years.

Today the Office of Coordinator followed suite with Federated Suns declaring their recognition of the new state soon after. 



This has been the CNB March broadcast.
